name: personId
description: The person’s unique ID. Required field. The value of the personId field must be the same as the id of the document.

fields.name: familyName
fields.description: The person’s family name/last name.

fields.name: givenName
fields.description: The person’s given name/first name.

fields.name: displayName
fields.description: The person’s display name.

fields.name: username
fields.description: The person’s username.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the email account, such as "work", "home", "other", or "custom".

fields.name: value
fields.description: The person's email address, such as "acruz@example.net".

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the phone number, such as "office", "mobile", or "other".

fields.name: value
fields.description: The person's phone number, such as "+1 800-555-1212".

name: suspended
description: Whether the person is suspended with the organization.

name: employeeType
description: The person’s employee type, such as "FTE", "Intern", or "Temp".

name: availabilityStatus
description: The person’s availability status, such as "OOO", "WFH", or "In Meeting".

name: creationDate
description: The person’s creation date in the source system.

name: modifiedDate
description: The person’s last modified date in the source system.

name: deletionDate
description: The person’s deletion date in the source system.

name: hireDate
description: The date when the person was hired.

fields.name: addressMeAs
fields.description: The person’s preferred pronoun choice, such as "he/him", "she/her", or "they/them".

fields.name: type
fields.description: The person’s gender, such as "male", "female", or "other".

fields.name: url
fields.description: The URL of the photo.

fields.name: imageBinary
fields.description: The Base64 encoded string of the image binary of the photo.

fields.name: format
fields.description: The format of the image binary, such as “png”.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country of the associated address.

fields.name: countryCode
fields.description: The country code of the associated address.

fields.name: locality
fields.description: The locality of the associated address.

fields.name: poBox
fields.description: The PO Box of the associated address.

fields.name: postalCode
fields.description: The postal code of the associated address.

fields.name: region
fields.description: The region of the associated address.

fields.name: streetAddress
fields.description: The associated street address.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the associated address.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The person's office location.

fields.name: buildingId
fields.description: The building ID of the person's office location.

fields.name: deskCode
fields.description: The desk code of the person's office location.

fields.name: floorName
fields.description: The floor name of the person's office location.

fields.name: floorSection
fields.description: The floor section of the location.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the location.

fields.name: department
fields.description: The department of the organization.

fields.name: description
fields.description: The description of the organization.

fields.name: jobTitle
fields.description: The person’s job title.

fields.name: location
fields.description: The location of the organization.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the organization.

fields.name: symbol
fields.description: The ticker symbol of the organization.

fields.name: costCenter
fields.description: The cost center of the organization.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the organization.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the person's assigned project.

fields.name: description
fields.description: The description of the person's assigned project.

fields.name: role
fields.description: The role of the person in the project.

fields.name: personId
fields.description: The personId of the person’s current management chain.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email address of each manager in the person’s current management chain.

fields.name: personId
fields.description: The person's dotted line report(s) (personId).

fields.name: email
fields.description: The person's dotted line reports (email).

fields.name: personId
fields.description: The person’s coworker(s) (personId).

fields.name: affinityScore
fields.description: The person’s affinity score relative to coworkers.

fields.name: personId
fields.description: Person's assigned admin(s) (personId).

fields.name: email
fields.description: Person's assigned admins (email).

fields.name: type
fields.description: Person's website type.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The URL of the website.

fields.name: personId
fields.description: The personId of the person’s direct/immediate manager.
